ai-thag4.8:1.2_0: because I’m accomplished in both ways:
ai-thag4.8:1.3_0: I am the son of the Buddha,
ai-thag4.8:2.4_0: master of the three knowledges, seer of the deathless.
ai-thag4.8:3.1_0: Blinded by sensual pleasures, trapped in a net,
ai-thag4.8:3.2_0: they are smothered over by craving;
ai-thag4.8:3.3_0: bound by the Kinsman of the Negligent,
ai-thag4.8:3.4_0: like a fish caught in a funnel-net trap.
ai-thag4.8:4.1_0: Having thrown off those sensual pleasures,
ai-thag4.8:4.3_0: and plucked out craving, root and all,
